article.paragraph:
We provide an open source ecosystem centered around optimization and operations research. The main project is the
Generic Allocator http://splitcells.net/net/splitcells/gel/index.html
, which is a constraint satisfaction solver based on the assignment problem model.

An overview of the projects can be found
here https://splitcells.net/net/splitcells/network/overview.html
. Some of them are not strictly related to optimization and can be used in other contexts as well.
OS State Interface https://splitcells.net/net/splitcells/os/state/interface/README.html
is a good example of such.
You have your own open source optimization software? How about working together?
